title: Basic Requirements To Start Your Own Pig Farm

subtasks: Acquire a suitable space to keep the pigs (intensive system)
Install a feeding trough for efficient feeding
Ensure a solid flooring to prevent damage from pigs
Provide a water source, either through a trough, wallowing system, or shower
Install a water tank for consistent water supply
Set up a roofing system to protect pigs from the elements
Prepare tools and equipment (shovel, broom, buckets)
Ensure availability of disinfectants for farm hygiene
